definition: to discuss/to comment/to criticize/to judge/to choose (by public appraisal)
example/mirror/to view/reflection/to reflect/to inspect/to warn/(ancient bronze mirror)

sentences.english: The third part is the evaluation of the character educational organizations.
sentences.chinese: 第三章，美国品格教育组织评鉴。

sentences.english: Assessment centers do present some problems.
sentences.chinese: 评鉴中心的确存在一些问题。

sentences.english: Strengthen partner relationship and establish a system for the certification of tourism business.
sentences.chinese: 强化伙伴关系并建立旅游业者等级评鉴制度。

sentences.english: The sixth chapter is to discuss the Criterion of ChuCi about Liu Xizai reviewing Ci.
sentences.chinese: 第六章，论刘熙载评鉴词的楚辞尺度。

sentences.english: ", and" Drawing up solid and workable school-based teacher evaluation system.
sentences.chinese: 拟发定具体可行的学校本位教师评鉴方案。

sentences.english: Readers can now join in the fun and help grade Ma's paper.
sentences.chinese: 读者现在可加以入协助评鉴马的论文。

sentences.english: In addition, confusion over evaluation criteria vitiates many evaluation projects.
sentences.chinese: 此外，对评鉴规准的困惑，使许多评鉴计画成效打折。

sentences.english: This site is not merely just a site-grading site, but have collected many interesting articles.
sentences.chinese: 此站除有评鉴可申请外，还收录了许多有趣的小文章。

sentences.chinese: 应用多重比较方法评鉴台湾上市公司之经营绩效。

sentences.english: Suggestions for website evaluation and future studies are offered.
sentences.chinese: 文末提出教育网站评鉴之实务与未来研究建议。

sentences.english: Unfortunately, the jury is still out on them.
sentences.chinese: 不幸的我们的评鉴人员还是将他们屏除在外。

sentences.english: The credibility of faculty evaluation is one of the most precarious and sensitive problems.
sentences.chinese: 大学教师评鉴的可信，依然是最人诟病且敏感的问题。

definition: to select on the basis of a vote or consensus
to display for evaluation/to exhibit and compare
to examine sth and make a decision/to screen/to evaluate/to approve
